com.blogspot.technicalmiracle

Class SpringAnimationFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • com.blogspot.technicalmiracle.SpringAnimationFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.widget.SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener

    public class SpringAnimationFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
implements android.widget.SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener
    A fragment using simple gestures to run Spring Animation for images with common and specified values.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  SpringAnimationFragment.TouchHandler
      A simple gesture detector for these moves : to the right, left, up, down.

      • onProgressChanged

        public void onProgressChanged(android.widget.SeekBar seekBar,
                              int progress,
                              boolean fromUser)
        Specified by:
        onProgressChanged in interface android.widget.SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener
        Parameters:
        seekBar - a SeekBar which value has change
        progress - a new value
        fromUser - On change the value of the SeekBar save current value into AnimationDATA.

      • onStartTrackingTouch

      • onStopTrackingTouch

        public void onStopTrackingTouch(android.widget.SeekBar seekBar)
        Specified by:
        onStopTrackingTouch in interface android.widget.SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener
        Parameters:
        seekBar - a SeekBar which value has change On end of change show to user current Damping Ratio and Stiffness. A Layout invalidate.

      • startAnimator4

        private void startAnimator4()
        Down to Up swipe performed. Start animator 4. The values of the Stiffness and Damp Ratio SeekBars will be used.

      • startAnimator3

        private void startAnimator3()
        Up to Down swipe performed. Start animator 3. The "MEDIUM" value constants from the SpringForce Class will be used.

      • startAnimator2

        private void startAnimator2()
        Right to Left swipe performed. Start animator 2. "HIGH" value constants from the SpringForce class will be used.

      • startAnimator1

        private void startAnimator1()
        Left to Right swipe performed. Start animator 1. "LOW" value constants from the SpringForce class will be used.

      • atEndofAnimation

        private void atEndofAnimation()
        The SeekBars enable after all animations end. Boolean value of animation state variable set to 'false'.
